hooks.command: jq -r '[.tool_input.file_path, .cwd] | @tsv' | while IFS=$'\t' read -r file cwd; do if [[ "$file" == *.ts ]] || [[ "$file" == *.tsx ]]; then if [ -f "$cwd/biome.json" ] || [ -f "$cwd/biome.jsonc" ]; then bunx --bun biome check --write "$file" 2>&1; fi; fi; done

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then if ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then dirty="✗"; else dirty=""; fi; git_info=" git:($branch)${dirty:+ }$dirty"; fi; fi; context_info=""; used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); if [ -n "$used" ]; then context_info=" [ctx: ${used}%]"; fi; printf "\e[36m➜\e[0m  \e[1m\e[36m%s\e[0m%s%s" "$dir_name" "$git_info" "$context_info"
